Create a "before and after" video showcasing your progress on a task and how it was completed seamlessly, in comparison to the struggle you faced initially.
Create a "day in the life" video showcasing your daily routine and how you manage to complete all your tasks with ease, to help alleviate jealousy.
Host a "how-to" video series on a task that you struggled with but was eventually completed seamlessly, and share tips and tricks for others facing similar challenges.
Create a "behind the scenes" video showcasing the preparation and planning that goes into completing a task seamlessly, to help others understand the importance of preparation.

Host a "reality check" video showcasing the reality of completing a task seamlessly, including the challenges and setbacks that were faced, to help others understand that success is not always immediate.
